headline.main: CHENNAULT FINDS SITUATION BETTER; Improvement in South China 'Chiefly Matter of Plans,' General Declares ACTION FOLLOWS TALK Air Commander's Bombers Raid Japanese Supply Point in Yunnan Province

lead_paragraph: AT A UNITED STATES AIR BASE, South China, Feb. 28 (Delayed) -- Brig. Gen. Claire L. Chennault was seated in an office marked "Commanding General, China Air Task Force," and feeling very chipper at an interview this morning.
abstract: Brig Gen C L Chennault sees Allied situation improved, China
snippet: AT A UNITED STATES AIR BASE, South China, Feb. 28 (Delayed) -- Brig. Gen. Claire L. Chennault was seated in an office marked "Commanding General, China Air Task Force," and feeling very chipper at an interview this morning....

byline.original: By BROOKS ATKINSONWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
